name: Tower of Sarnath
description:
You are the last standing warrior of Sarnath, built upon the blood of the seafolk of Ib.
After 1000 years of prosperity, the weird creatures of Ib have come back for revenge and Sarnath must pay the price.

Controls and instructions:

Survive for 3 minutes of increasing difficulty to win the game!

Every 30 seconds the difficulty increases.

~ You need to let your crossbow reload before shooting again! ~

Controls:

Walk - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Shoot - Left mouse button (+1 energy on hit)

Bash - Right mouse button (Costs 1 energy)

Dash - Space (Costs 2 energy)

Ulti - Q (Costs all 6 energy)

Details:

Bash kills enemies in front of you when in a pickle.

Dash makes you roll towards the mouse, killing all enemies along the way.

Ulti makes you jump towards the tower center, killing all enemies on the plateau. The protagonists says "A-haa!" as a que when you have full energy and can use the ulti.

All abilities make you temporarily invulnerable.
